thread.title: Markets Note: The BSE and the NSE will remain closed Friday

author: financialexpress.com
title: Markets Note: The BSE and the NSE will remain closed Friday
text:
Other Articles RBI restricts further FII purchase of Prestige Estate stake Small, mid-cap stocks outperform blue-chips Stocks that jumped over 50 per cent in first half of FY16 The Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE) and the National Stock Exchange (NSE) will remain closed tomorrow (Friday) for ‘Gandhi Jayanti’
All wholesale commodity markets, including bullion and metal will remain closed too.
First Published on October 01, 2015 9:44 pm
